subject: WP Engine wins Gold Stevie Award for customer service excellence
body:
A gold standard in customer support 
WP Engine’s Customer Experience team earns top honors at this year’s Stevie Awards.
 
Find Out More Here 
 
A HISTORY OF EXCELLENCE IN SERVICE
Recognized leadership in customer support 
At WP Engine, customer satisfaction is more than a goal—it’s a driving force. That’s why we’re proud to announce that our Customer Experience (CX) team has earned the prestigious 
Gold Stevie Award
 for Customer Service Department of the Year in the Computer Services category! 
 
This incredible honor marks another major achievement in our long-standing history of excellence in customer service. Since 2015, WP Engine has won more than a dozen Stevie Awards, and our CX team is at the heart of this success. Continually setting the bar for exceptional support, their tireless dedication ensures that every customer experience is 
Customer-Inspired
. 
 
Here’s why this recognition is so special: 
Marks our 11th Stevie Award for customer support and our 15th Stevie Award overall
Highlights over a decade of consistent achievement at The Stevie Awards
Underscores the dedication and commitment of our incredible support agents  
Thank you to our amazing CX team and customers for making this possible. Let’s keep raising the bar together! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
WP Engine, 504 Lavaca St, #1000, Austin,TX 78701

subject: Free Guide: Why Coaching Fails to Deliver Results
body:
How can you find a coaching provider capable of delivering results? 
 
Why Coaching Fails to Deliver Results
3 MIN READ
DOWNLOAD NOW
 
Free Guide!
 
Executive coaching can create incredible outcomes for leaders and their organizations. But, for every company in the coaching industry creating outstanding ROI for their clients, there are an equal number of companies doing the opposite. Maybe that is why only about 33% of business leaders in a Harvard Business Review survey said they were more effective after participating in a coaching or leadership development program.
 
 
How can you find a coaching provider capable of delivering results? Uncover the six reasons why most coaching providers fail to deliver the ROI they promise. And, we explain what HR and Talent Leaders can do about them.

subject: Faster, smarter hosting for long-term growth
body:
The latest features built to elevate site performance
 
Get the most out of your hosting 
See how to optimize for speed, security, and savings with our new TCO guide.
 
COST VS. PERFORMANCE
WP Engine fuels growth, 
not expenses 
A high-performing website doesn’t have to come with high costs. Many businesses unknowingly invest in hosting that limits scalability, slows performance, and leads to higher expenses over time. Our latest guide explores how Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) impacts performance and how WP Engine keeps your site fast, secure, and cost-effective. 
 
Here’s what you’ll learn: 
How performance optimization can drive revenue and lower costs. 
The hidden expenses of low-cost or DIY hosting.
